item.description:
EVENT: A fun time for all, play a round of golf at McGolfâ€™s mingolf and get a chance to test your skills out with some other Mosaic members at one of the best courses in the area. McGolf is also noted for having some great ice cream that people can enjoy after playing a round or 2. Possible Dinner after the Golf.

Trip Coordinator: Andrea anissenbaum@lycos.com
MEET: Meet 4:00pm at McGolf Rte 109 Westwood in the parking lot near the entrance. Bring bug spray and rain cancels.
RSVP: Required by August 20st and try to include a cellphone number in case contact is needed on the day of the event. Use the Trip Coorinator's email addr above to RSVP and to get any further details
COST: $7.50 for golf and $5 as a guest which is credited towards a full membership of $25 when you join Mosaic of MA

group.name: Mosaic Jewish Outdoor Club of Massachusetts

item.name: MINATURE GOLF
